description: Try our easy to follow Angel Food Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sponge cake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Raspberry,Sesame free,Baking,Mother's Day,Soy free,Vegetarian,Easter,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Angel Food Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Sift flour into a bowl, then repeat sifting three times. Place egg whites into the large bowl of a mixer. Add cream of tartar and a pinch of salt, and beat until soft peaks form.
Gradually add sugar, beating until stiff. Fold in vanilla, then lightly fold in flour, being careful not to lose the volume of air in the egg whites.
Pour into an ungreased angel food cake tin. Bake for 40 minutes. Turn cake upside down, still in pan, and let stand for about an hour to slowly cool.
Transfer to a cake stand and dust over icing sugar. Serve cake topped with berries.
